name: Nothing Can Harm You
description:
Semi-complete. Just wanting to make sure I get something up for the Extra Credits Holiday Jam in case I get an internet outage or something.

Telo's mother has just died. And in doing so, she gave them a gift. A gift of power.

A short side scrolling 'walking simulator'. Telo couldn't be harmed even if there were enemies.

They'd rather not have it.

things that I will try and add before the Jam ends:

-vertical movement in the latter 2/3 of the game, including the jump

-a fade in effect to remove the 'accidental jumpscare' when Telo has a flashback.

Also note that Telo doesn't have sprites or animation. That will be reserved for a more polished "post jam" version.

WARNINGS:

-blood.

-one death.

-an unintended jumpscare due to a scene transition (Will be fixed).

-overall melancholy tone.
